definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: lamentation, wailing, only Ez Eze 2:10 [[וְכָתוּב אֵלָיהָ קִינִים וׇהֶגֶה וׇהִי]] and written in it were lamentations and mourning and wailing (LXX ou)ai/, woe! Ew:§ 101 c comp. [[אִי]], cf. III. [[אִי]] p. 33 supr., acc. to Thes Sta:§ 125 b al. [[הִי]] = [[נְהִי]], [[נ]] being dropped; Ol:§ 77 g, 144 c would emend [[נְהִי]] so Co; v. [[נְהִי]] sub [[נהה]]. Text very dubious).
